fn.p: Citation: Rossi D, Shadman M, Condoluci A, Brown JR, Byrd JC, Gaidano G, Hallek M, Hillmen P, Mato A, Montserrat E, Ghia P. How we Manage Patients with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia During the SARS-CoV-2 Pandemic. HemaSphere, 2020;4:4(e432). http://dx.doi.org/10.1097/HS9.0000000000000432
